help-file.title: "DARK DREAMER"
help-file.content: - Spell (8th): shadow merging: will hide the illusionist, and if following someone else will merge illusionist shadow with theirs, allowing the illusionist to follow hidden - Spell (10th): gate to Ard'gral: opens up a gate to Ard'Gral the Quasi-Elemental plane of dreams, where portals open up to all parts of the world and other planes. More information below.. - Spell (9th): Shadow Spawn: creates a vortex in the room that manifests the nightmares of the illusionist opponents. The nightmares can be so bad that people will shut their eyes or even try to flee from them!
